articles.author: Rebecca Falconer
articles.title: Australia will recognize a Palestinian state, PM Albanese says - Axios
articles.description: It follows pledges from the leaders of countries including Canada and France to also recognize Palestinian statehood in September.
articles.content: Driving the news: "A two-state solution is humanity's best hope to break the cycle of violence in the Middle East and to bring an end to the conflict, suffering and starvation in Gaza," Albanese said… [+1251 chars]
